espnscrapeR 0.3.1
  • Reference

Scrape ESPN FPI ratings for a specific season from ESPN's site

Source: R/scrape_fpi.R
scrape_fpi.Rd

Scrape ESPN FPI ratings for a specific season from ESPN's site

scrape_fpi(season = 2020, stat = "FPI")

Arguments

season

Either numeric or character
stat

One of 'FPI', 'EFF' or 'PROJ'

Value

Returns a tibble

Examples

# Get team offensive and defensive efficiency from 2020 season
scrape_fpi(2020, stat = "EFF")
#> Scraping EFF for 2020!
#> # A tibble: 32 x 11
#>    season team  w_l   eff_ove rnk_ove eff_off rnk_off eff_def rnk_def eff_spe

#>  3   2020 Buff… 15-4…    69.6       3    73.9       5    47.8      10    68.7
#>  4   2020 Tamp… 14-5…    67.3       4    75         4    50.3       7    51.1
#>  5   2020 Balt… 12-6…    67.1       5    64.8      12    54.2       5    67.1
#>  6   2020 New … 13-5…    64.2       6    70.3       7    51.8       6    48  
#>  7   2020 Pitt… 12-5…    61.3       7    54.7      19    66.8       2    39.7
#>  8   2020 Seat… 12-5…    61         8    63.5      14    49         9    63.8
#>  9   2020 Indi… 11-6…    60.5       9    66.5      10    44.8      14    58.4
